fix: correct status command shipped detection and decision.md path (HODGE-312)

## What Changed
- **Status Command** (src/commands/status.ts: 14 lines modified)
  - Fixed Bug 1: Changed decision.md detection from explore/ to feature root (line 39)
  - Fixed Bug 2: Added shipped status detection using ship-record.json (lines 65-67)
  - Added "Shipped" as 6th progress checkpoint in status display (line 85)
  - Updated next steps logic to show appropriate message for shipped features (lines 110-115)

- **Test Coverage** (src/commands/status.smoke.test.ts: 32 lines added)
  - Added smoke test for decision.md detection at feature root (lines 61-72)
  - Added smoke test for shipped status detection (lines 74-91)
  - All 6 smoke tests now passing

- **Project Metadata** (.hodge/: 6 files updated)
  - Recorded 6 implementation decisions for HODGE-312
  - Updated PM tracking in id-mappings.json
  - Created feature tracking structure

## Why This Change
The `hodge status` command had two critical bugs causing incorrect feature status:

1. **Decision Detection Bug**: Checked for decision.md in wrong location (explore/ 
   subdirectory instead of feature root), causing all features to show "Decision: â—‹" 
   even when decisions existed.

2. **Shipped Detection Missing**: No code to detect shipped features (missing 
   ship-record.json check), causing shipped features to appear as "ready to ship" 
   instead of "shipped".

Root cause: Status command predated (a) decision file location change and (b) 
ship-record.json introduction. Applied same fix from HODGE-311 for consistency.
